sections.title: Introduction to Stages
sections.content: Stages are the fundamental building blocks of a chapter in Erainor RPG. A chapter consists of a sequence of stages, each containing text, properties, and possible player choices.

sections.title: Types of Stages
sections.content:
There are mainly two types of stages: Linear and Input.

1. Linear Stages: These are straightforward and lead the player from one stage to the next.
2. Input Stages: These stages provide the player with input choices and may lead to different paths based on the selected choice.
